resources.string: EXAMPLE: with joy, adhering to the view that there is nothing wrong with stealing, a boy spontaneously steals an apple from a fruit shop.

INCLUDED IN A COMBINATION WITH 19 CHETASIKAS: 

 UNIVERSAL:
 >> 1. Contact (Phassa) 
 >> 2. Feeling (Vedanā)
 >> 3. Perception (Saññā)
 >> 4. Volition (Cetana) 
 >> 5. One-pointedness (Ekaggatā)
 >> 6. Management life-ability (Jīvitindriya) 
 >> 7. Attention (Manasikāra) 

 HAPPENING FROM TIME TO TIME:
 >> 8. Starter application (Vitakka)
 >> 9. Sustainable application (Vicāra)
 >> 10. Determination (Adhimokkha)
 >> 11. Energy (Viriya)
 >> 12. Enthusiasm (Pīti)
 >> 13. Desire to act (Chanda) 

 UNIVERSAL UNBENEFITABLE: 
 >> 14. Misconception (Moha)
 >> 15. Shamelessness (Ahirika)
 >> 16. Fearlessness of evil deeds (Anottappa)
 >> 17. Anxiety (Uddhacca)

 ADVERSE THINGS THAT HAPPEN FROM TIME TO TIME: 
 >> 18. Greed (Lobha) 
 >> 19. Erroneous view (Diṭṭhi)
